content: Aveva piovuto per molti giorni, e la strada era cos√¨ fangosa che, a volte, Pinocchio sprofondava quasi fino alle ginocchia.
translations: eng:It had rained for many days, and the road was so muddy that, at times, Pinocchio sank down almost to his knees
